PersonExamination.name: PersonExamination
PersonExamination.description: Represents the examinations taken by a person.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact related to this record.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date from which the examination is effective from.

EffectiveTo.description: Date till which the examination is effective.

InstituitionName.description: Name of the institution offering the examination.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the examination taken by the person.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this record.

VerificationDateTime.description: Date and time the examination details were verified.

VerificationStatus.description: Status of the examination details verification.
